item.description:
Crazy work week, not feelin' the bar scene on Friday night? Don't stay at home! Take a nap, then join me for a late nite movie. Cinemaworld in Lincoln, RI has a Cult Classics summer series every Friday & Saturday night for $2. http://www.cinemaworl...

This weekend Cinemaworld is featuring... GHOSTBUSTERS!

Cinemaworld is located in/behind the Lincoln mall (Lincoln, RI). I occasionally venture here to catch a movie, the theatre is pretty nice and gets my vote for cleanliness. It is not that far from Providence--it takes me about 15 min. from the Eastside. The easiest way to enter the theatre is to go past the Stop 'n Shop around to the backside of the "mall".

And Ghostbusters, well, if you somehow missed this classic... you really should come!

For my sanity, I am going to ask that everyone purchase their own ticket--it just gets too confusing if people cancel and such. I will try to call ahead and post a message here to see approx. how many people these events attract and if there is likely to be a long line before the movie.

I plan to get my ticket around 9ish then head over to Chili's for some chips&salsa and a 'rita before the movie--if you want to join me (YEAH, you DO! :-). Chili's is not connected to the mall, but, it is in that same plaza section across the mall parking lot.

We will meet outside the theatre by 10:45pm


P.S. This is my first event as an assistant organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will plan to wear a ridiculously long, goofy, pearl necklace that will likely not match my outfit.
item.name: Late Nite @ the Movies: "I ain't 'fraid of no ghost!"
